org.apache.ignite.ml.knn.classification

Class KNNClassificationModel<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.knn.classification.KNNClassificationModel<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Function<Vector,Double>, Exportable<KNNModelFormat>, IgniteFunction<Vector,Double>, Model<Vector,Double>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KNNRegressionModel

    public class KNNClassificationModel<K,V>
extends Object
implements Model<Vector,Double>, Exportable<KNNModelFormat>
    kNN algorithm model to solve multi-class classification task.

      • findKNearestNeighbors

        protected List<LabeledVector> findKNearestNeighbors(Vector v)
        The main idea is calculation all distance pairs between given vector and all vectors in training set, sorting them and finding k vectors with min distance with the given vector.
        Parameters:
        v - The given vector.
        Returns:
        K-nearest neighbors.
